metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1290 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in WebKit, as used on the Research In Motion (RIM)BlackBerry Torch 9800 with firmware 6.0.0.246, in Google Chrome before10.0.648.133, and in Apple Safari before 5.0.5, allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via unknown vectors related to CSS "style handling,"nodesets, and a length value, as demonstrated by Vincenzo Iozzo, WillemPinckaers, and Ralf-Philipp Weinmann during a Pwn2Own competition atCanSecWest 2011.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-1.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-3.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-1.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-3.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-3.0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-bin - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-3.0-25 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-1.0-common - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwebkitgtk-3.0-common - 2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
No subscription required

chromium-browser - 10.0.648.133~r77742-0ubuntu1
chromium-browser-l10n - 10.0.648.133~r77742-0ubuntu1
chromium-chromedriver - 10.0.648.133~r77742-0ubuntu1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 10.0.648.133~r77742-0ubuntu1

No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.8-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
chromium-browser package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.648.133~r77742-0ubuntu1').
